title: Preacher, Volume 6: War in the Sun
description: The Reverend Jesse Custer faces his deadliest challenge yet in this, the sixth Preacher collection. Jesse, along with his gun-toting girlfriend, Tulip, and the hard-drinking Irish vampire Cassidy, faces a deadly showdown in the desert with the ruthless Starr and the forces of the U.S. military -- including a nuclear warhead.Collects: Preacher #34â€“40, Preacher Special: One Man's War
author: Garth Ennis
